name: Password

name: Password
nl_constraint: The password shall contain one of the following characters: !, #, $.
function:
def this_function(s: str) -> bool:
    return any(c in {'!', '#', '$'} for c in s)

function:

name: Date
nl_constraint: The date shall contain two hyphens.

name: Date
nl_constraint: If there are at least one hyphen, the part before the first hyphen shall be a number between 0 and 2025.
